rukus.text: Aap keh dijey kay mein to sirf apney rab hi ko pukarta hon aur iss kay sath kissi ko shareek nahi banata
Keh dijey kay mujhy tumhary kissi nuksan nafa ka ikhtiyar nahi
Kehdijey kay mujhy hergiz koi Allah say bacha nahi sakta aur mein hergiz uss kay siwa koi jay e panah bhi paa nahi sakta

Albata (mera kam) Allah ki baat aur iss kay peghamaat(logon ko)phuncha dena hia(abb)jo bhi Allah aur uss kay rasool kin a maanay ga uss kay liye jahanum ki aag hai jiss mein aisay log hamesha rahengay
(unki aankh na khulaygi)Yahan tak kay ussay dekhlen jiss ka unko wada diya jata hia pus unqareeb jaan lengay kay kiss ki jamat kum hai
Kehdijey kay mujhy maloom nahi kay jiss ka wada tum say kiya jata hai wo qareeb hia ya mera rab uss kay liye door ki muddat mukarrer keryga
Wo ghaib ka jannay wala hai aur apney ghaib per kisi ko mutlaa nahi kerta
Siwaey uss peyghamber kay jissay wo pasand kerley lekin usskay bhi aagay pechay pehraydar muqarrer kerdyta hai
Takay unkay apney rab kay paygham phoncha denay ka ilm hojaey.Allah talah ney unkay aas pass (ki tamam cheezon )ka ehaata ker rakha hai aur her cheez ki gintee ka shumaar ker rakha hai
